name: TeachAid
synopsis: This is a collaborative project that was done by me and 3 of my classmates. It is a web application that organizes nominations of grade school students for monthly awards. It is done in a MERN Stack.

name: Giphy
synopsis: This simple application demonstrates using AJAX API calls and JQuery.

name: Mystery Crystals
synopsis: Mystery Crystals is a game where the user has to collect crystals that add up to a randomly generated target value.

name: Trivia Game
synopsis: This game demonstrates the use of time restrictions with in functions using the JQuery library.
